functions.name: workspace_directory_external_access_restricted
functions.description: Restricts external access to workspace directory.

functions.name: workspace_external_groups_access_restricted
functions.description: Restricts access to external groups in workspace.

functions.name: workspace_mail_protection_against_untrusted_attachments
functions.description: Enables mail protection against untrusted attachments.

functions.name: workspace_email_anomalous_attachment_protection_enabled
functions.description: Enables protection against anomalous email attachments.

functions.name: workspace_mail_encrypted_attachments_protection_enabled
functions.description: Enables protection for encrypted mail attachments.

functions.name: calendar_web_offline_disabled
functions.description: Disables web offline access for calendar.

functions.name: gmail_external_recipient_warnings_enabled
functions.description: Enables warnings for external recipients in Gmail.

functions.name: chat_hangouts_external_filesharing_disabled
functions.description: Disables external file sharing in Chat/Hangouts.

functions.name: chat_hangouts_internal_filesharing_disabled
functions.description: Disables internal file sharing in Chat/Hangouts.

functions.name: gmail_spam_filter_internal_senders
functions.description: Enables spam filter for internal senders in Gmail.

functions.name: gmail_quarantine_admin_notifications_enabled
functions.description: Enables admin notifications for Gmail quarantine.
